title: House Manderly: Part 1 - Blood of the Merling (video)
description:
...a thousand years ago... We explore the double backstory of House Manderly, the ancient realm in the south where they came to be, and the ancient realm in the north where they reside and prosper now. Video available on Spotify. Published April 17, 2018.
